fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • The rusty-spotted cat was filmed in Sri Lanka for the BBC series Big Cats, not in Central American rainforests as we said in a review of the documentary (12 January, page 25, G2). • Caroline Ansell lost her seat in last June’s general election and is no longer the Conservative MP for Eastbourne (Birthdays, 12 January, page 39). • Other recently corrected articles include: End of the A380 superjumbo? Airbus warns future of plane at risk Trinidad waits on British judges’ death row ruling as murders soar Philippines raises Mayon volcano threat level to ‘critical’
